line_1: And, tho' by Fools despis'd, by Saints unbless'd,
line_2: By Friends neglected, and by Foes oppress'd,

line_1: Still let me sigh among mankind unbless'd;
line_2: Great Lord of life, if daring I request,

line_1: Rage on, and make thee equally unbless'd,
line_2: In what thou want'st, and what thou hast possess'd.

line_1: Less wretched they, and yet unbless'd,
